introduction.title:
Spending
<accent>Balance</accent>
introduction.text: Fund your spending balance to enjoy instant and cheap transactions with friends, family, and merchants.

funding.title: Fund your <accent>spending balance</accent>
funding.text: You can use your Bitkit savings or send bitcoin from a different wallet.
funding.text_blocked: At this time, Bitkit cannot provide automatic Lightning connections to residents of the United States and Canada.

no_funds.title: No Available Funds
no_funds.description: Before you can transfer funds from your savings balance, you need to send bitcoin to your Bitkit wallet.

transfer.text_slider: Choose how much money you want to be able to spend instantly and how much you want to keep in savings.
transfer.text_numpad: Enter the amount of money you want to be able to spend instantly.
transfer.error_min_amount: Spending amount needs to be at least ₿ {amount}
transfer.error_max_amount: Spending amount needs to be smaller than ₿ {amount}

transfer_failed.title:
Transfer
<accent>failed</accent>
transfer_failed.text: Sorry, Bitkit could not set up your spending balance or complete your transfer. Please try again.

error_channel_setup_msg: An error occurred when setting up your instant balance. {raw}
error_channel_receiving: Receiving amount needs to be greater than ${usdValue}
enter_money: Enter the amount of bitcoin you want to be able to spend instantly.
note_blocktank_limit: The amount you can transfer to your spending balance is currently limited to ${usdValue}.
note_reserve_limit: The amount you can transfer to your spending balance is limited to {percentage}%. You need to keep funds in reserve to move this bitcoin back to savings.
quick_confirm_cost: It costs <accent>{txFee}</accent> in network fees and <accent>{lspFee}</accent> in service provider fees to transfer your funds.
spending_amount_bitcoin: Choose how much money you want to be able to spend instantly.
receiving_amount_money: Choose how much money you want to be able to receive instantly.
receiving_amount_bitcoin: Enter the amount of Bitcoin you want to be able to receive instantly.
custom_confirm_cost: It costs <accent>{txFee}</accent> in network fees and <accent>{lspFee}</accent> in service provider fees  fees to transfer your funds. Your spending balance should stay active for at least <accentWithKeyboard>{weeks, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}}.<penIcon/></accentWithKeyboard>
duration_text: Choose the minimum number of weeks you want this part of your spending balance (Lightning Channel) to remain active.
setting_up_text: Please wait, your funds transfer is in progress. This should take <accent>±10 minutes.</accent>
result_text: Your funds have been transferred and your spending balance is ready to use.
timeout_text: Funds were not transferred yet. Bitkit will try to initiate the transfer during the next <accent>30 minutes</accent>. Please keep your app open.
transfer_close: Transferring your spending balance back to your savings requires a network fee. The exact fee depends on network conditions.
ts_savings_text: Your funds have been transferred to your savings. You are able to use these funds immediately.
availability_text: Funds transfer to savings is usually instant, but settlement may take up to <accent>14 days</accent> under certain network conditions.
node_failed: Bitkit failed to initialize the Lightning node.
error_logs_description: Bitkit was not able to export the LDK logs.
error_add: Bitkit could not add the Lightning peer.
error_add_raw: An error occured while we added lightning peer: {raw}
error_add_uri: The URI appears to be invalid.
peer_saved: The Lightning peer was successfully added and saved.

connection_closed.title: Connection Closed
connection_closed.description: Your Lightning Connection has closed. Your funds transferred to your savings.

close_error_msg: Unable to transfer your funds back to savings. Please try again.
close_success_msg: Your funds are being transferred back to your savings.
close_text:
The fee to close this Lightning Connection and transfer your funds back to your savings depends on network conditions.

Funds transfer to savings is usually instant, but settlement may take up to <accent>14 days</accent> under certain network conditions.
force_text: Could not initiate transfer. Do you want to force this transfer? You won’t be able to use these funds for ±14 days (!)
force_init_msg: Your funds will be accessible in ±14 days.
force_failed_msg: Unable to transfer your funds back to savings. Please try again.
channel_opened_msg: You can now pay anyone, anywhere, instantly.
order_given_up_msg: The setup process expired. Please try again.
order_expired_msg: The setup process expired. Please try again.
wait_text_top: Please wait for Bitkit to connect to the payment network (±10 seconds).
